root: ^Our class went to the zoo. My classmate was naughty and opened the cage and let out the leopard. What should I do?
^Tell the teacher privately not to cause panic
^See what happens, it could be fun!

res1: ^Everybody got scared as hell, and the leopard most of all. They could barely catch it. The naughty classmate was expelled

^We were in the zoo, when my classmate was naughty and let a leopard out of its cage. I screamed, and everybody got scared, the leopard most of all. They could barely catch it. The naughty classmate was expelled.
res2: ^We all had to urgently leave the zoo. That little nasty bully ruined our day! He deserves detention

^We were in the zoo, when my classmate was naughty and let a leopard out of its cage. I quietly told the teacher about it, and our class left the zoo. That nasty little bully ruined our beautiful day! He deserves detention.
res3: ^It was real fun! Everyone's panicking, just me and my classmate laughing. Too bad they managed to catch the leopard so quickly...

^We were in the zoo, when my classmate was naughty and let a leopard out of its cage. It was fun! Everyone's panicking, just me and my classmate laughing. Too bad they managed to catch the leopard so quickly...
res4: ^The leopard chased after me and bit my heel! It doesn't hurt that bad, but I'm glad that my nasty classmate was expelled

^We were in the zoo, when my classmate was naughty and let a leopard out of its cage. I ran, and the leopard chased me and bit my heel. It doesn't hurt that bad, but I'm glad that my nasty classmate was expelled.
